author: ltheussl
msg: Use new test classes, make testing independent of apt-module. Avoid constructor throwing Exception.

author: ate
msg: JS2-770: Provide a new maven-2 (only) build environment and restructure the source tree according to the maven-2 conventions
- deleting all Maven-1, Maven-2 and related/references Ant build environment configuration
- also deleting maven-1 or maven-2 specific project/folders like the maven-1-plugin and the maven-2 archetypes, portal and enterprise assembly folders
note: the archtetypes we probably will need again, but I prefer we start clean with those too

author: gshimansky
msg: I also removed the test from exclude list
